titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Carl Daniel Erskine.
A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Carl Daniel Erskine.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the life and legacy of Carl Daniel Erskine, including his dedication to (1) the game of baseball and fans in Indiana, (2) his work on and off the field in Indiana, and (3) the various lives he improved through philanthropic endeavors.
